The Mocobios departing early the next morn- ing, which was Sunday, Debayakaikin divided his forces into three companies, and sallied from his hirling-place by three different ways, in the very sight of the town. Its guard, Raphael de los Rios‚ who happened to be at that time reposing in his hut, was pierced with many and deep wounds by an Abipon, whose father had fallen iu the skirmish between Ycho- alay and Oaherkaikin.
